Class LoggingHandlerImpl

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
LogSettingsChangeListener, SettingsChangeListener, LoggingHandler
public class LoggingHandlerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements LoggingHandler, LogSettingsChangeListener

This class contains methods for logging actions
